net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps.layers
Class GridLayer

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps.layers.Layer
      net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps.layers.GridLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class GridLayer
extends Layer
implements Renderable

A layer of tiles that is part of a level. It's named "grid" so as to not conflict with the stubby libgdx idea of a TiledLayer which isn't a layer at all, really.

Creates a new object layer with a parent level and group of objects.

Parameters:
parent - The parent level of the layer
layer - The underlying layer of this abstraction
layerID - The numeric identifier of the underlying layer
